basic.description: The primary focus of the course will be the theological perspectives and social functions of apocalyptic in select religious traditions. The course will also survey the appropriation of apocalyptic themes throughout history in artistic forms such as art, fiction, and film, with particular attention to our modern times and cultures. Offered jointly with RELS-328*. Not offered 2010-2011.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Interpretation Apocalyptic Lit
